decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority (before the building(s) is/are occupied/used).
Condition : 3 - The fence hereby permitted shall be green in colour and a weldmesh type unless otherwise agreed in writing.

Condition : 4 - It is considered that this application for the erection of a 3.0 high fencing and creation of all weather sports pitch at Isleworth and Syon School, willl not be detrimental to the appearance of the character of the street scene or to the amenities of the adjoining and neighbouring properties.  On balance, the development is in accordance with Policies ENV-B.1.1 (New Development) and C.2.1 (Educational Facilities) of the London Borough of Hounslow UDP, Adopted December 2003.  It is considered that where the development is not compliant there are no undue adverse effects resulting from this.
description: Provision of new 3.0m high fencing within school boundary to enclose new all-weather sports pitches.
